attributes.action: establish an inquiry to establish whether natural climate change affects CO2 levels in the atmosphere or whether CO2 levels affect climate change and to cease any legislation and regulation until the result is known.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the documentary "The Great Global Warming Swindle" there would appear to be ample evidence to at least question the basis of the government's policy on climate change. The lack of any rigorous evidence to support the government's current policy (and the opposition's policy as well) does not give the government any basis for their expenditure and control of behaviour through taxation and regulation. We the undersigned petition the prime minister to look again at the evidence and explain why the current policies should persist and if the evidence suggests that they shouldn't, to announce as such and cease.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
